original: 曹操親自率軍南下。當時的荊州刺史不戰而降，駐紮樊城的劉備聞訊向江陵撤退，並通知關羽率水軍前往江陵會合。
text: Cao Cao personally led the army southward. At that time, the governor of Jingzhou surrendered without a fight. Liu Bei, who was stationed in Fancheng, retreated to Jiangling upon hearing the news and informed Guan Yu to lead the navy to join Jiangling.
